data.title: John C Grant
data.meta_site_name: Pollock-Randall & Marysville Funeral Homes - Port Huron, MI
data.text:
John Charles Grant, 53, of Kimball Township, died Friday, July 31, 2020.

He was born January 2, 1967 in Port Huron to the late John Grant and Roselynn Paterson.

Mr. Grant was a process tech engineer in the plastics industry for many years. He was an outdoorsman who loved hunting, fishing and riding his motorcycle. He also enjoyed building things, playing video games, watching movies and spending time with his family. John was loving and caring and the funniest person you could ever meet.

He is survived by his son, Brandon Grant; two brothers, Robert Grant and Joe (Mollie) Paterson; sister, Teri Lynn Paterson; nephews, Logan Paterson and Nick Grant; and nieces, Amanda (William) Doyle and Jessica Paterson.

A private visitation for his family will be held on Thursday, August 6, 2020 in the Marysville Funeral Home. Friends may join the family at 12 noon for a procession to Our Lady of Mt. Carmel Cemetery in Emmett for a graveside service.

Arrangements are by Marysville Funeral Home. To send condolences, visit marysvillefuneralhome.com
